类 OKMRemoteServiceServlet

            • com.openkm.servlet.frontend.OKMRemoteServiceServlet
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.SerializationPolicyProvider, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    直接已知子类:
    AuthServlet, BookmarkServlet, ChatServlet, DashboardServlet, DatabaseMetadataServlet, DocumentServlet, DropboxServlet, FolderServlet, GeneralServlet, KeyValueServlet, LanguageServlet, MacrosServlet, MailServlet, MassiveServlet, NoteServlet, NotifyServlet, OmrServlet, PropertyGroupServlet, PropertyServlet, RepositoryServlet, SearchServlet, TestServlet, ThesaurusServlet, UINotificationServlet, UserConfigServlet, WorkflowServlet, WorkspaceServlet

    public class OKMRemoteServiceServlet
extends com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.RemoteServiceServlet
    Extends the RemoteServiceServlet to obtain token auth on development and production environments. Config.GWTDS determines the environment development and production values.
    作者:
    jllort
